---
title: "Flex Dashboard Example"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(shiny)
Name <- c("Wysocki", "McBeth", "McMahon","Wysocki","McBeth","McMahon","Wysocki","McBeth","McMahon")
Year <- c(2020,2020,2020,2021,2021,2021,2022,2022,2022)
Elo <- c(1700,1800,1900,1750,1850,1950,1800,1900,2000)
testdata <- data.frame(Name,Year,Elo)
```

Inputs {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
 selectInput("Name", label = h3("Player Name"), 
    choices = c(unique(testdata$Name)), 
    selected = "McBeth")
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
kable(testdata)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
nam <- reactive((input$Name))
renderTable(
  testdata[Name==nam(),]
            )
```

### Chart C

```{r}
renderPlot(
  plot(Elo~Year,data=testdata[Name==nam(),])
  )
```
